name: A Little Soldier
description:
A Little Soldier, the first project of Little Game, is release!

A Little Soldier follows an unknown mercenary who wakes up at another dimension and has to survive through a challenge. Fight after fight, the past will be revealed, letting player knows what had happened before the mercenary is here. What will happen to the mercenary? Can you help him make it through the challenge? Collecting items, finishing quests for rewards and defeat many enemies to find out!

 Beside the story mode, there are 3 side modes for player to spend some more times and challenge itself.  Give it a try and see how far you can go! 

A Little Soldier may receive update with rebalance, rework and new contents in the future. Your support and feedback are appreciated and encourage the developer to keep expanding A Little Soldier. 

Have fun!
